announcement: Consent-only, public-view audits. Educational. You stay in control.

ribbon.title: Manual Audit Promise:
ribbon.copy: No bots, no scraping, no API. Every audit is performed by a human, reviewing only what’s publicly visible.

hero.title: See your Facebook the way a stranger does.
hero.subtitle: Independent, consent-only exposure audit of your public Facebook. Human performed. You choose what to change.
hero.badges: No logins. No friend requests. Public-view only. Evidence-based.

card.lead: Manual, not AI: I personally review posts, photos, comments, and visible profile fields. No logins, no friend requests, no bypassing privacy.
card.note: Effort depends on how much you’ve posted—3 posts in 12 months vs. 300 is a different scope. The estimator below helps set expectations.

summary.clarity.p: See your Facebook exactly as a stranger would. No surprises.
summary.control.p: You decide what to keep public or change. I don’t prescribe.
summary.proof.p: Every finding is documented with screenshots so you can verify.

est.title: Scope Estimator
est.desc: A quick way to set expectations. This isn’t automated scanning—it’s a manual review. Estimates help match effort to your goals.
est.note: These are non-binding estimates to aid planning. All audits are human-performed using only public information.

about.desc: Who I am and why I care.

how.title: How it works
how.tagline: The DARK process, step by step.

deliverables.title: What you get

ethics.title: Ethics & Consent
ethics.tagline: This service exists to protect, educate, and empower—not to exploit.

about.title: About
about.tagline: Who I am, why I care about privacy, and how I think about OSINT.

contact.title: Start here
contact.tagline: Consent-only, human-performed audits. Message me first if you have questions, or go straight to the intake form when ready.
